resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my important skills related to software engineering and project delivery.

education.school: University of Pittsburgh - School of Computing and Information
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: I graduated with a 3.96 GPA and internship experience. This degree gave me an invaluable, traditional foundation in software engineering.

education.school: University of Pittsburgh - Dietrich School of Arts and Science
education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Music Composition
education.description: My passion for music is unbounded. At school, I found ways to combine computer science and music. I created generative music programs, live-coded compositions, and researched artifical intelligence for music and art.

work.title: Lead Software Engineer
work.description: As a software engineer at Conduction Inc, a music technology startup in Pittsburgh, PA, I have led the engineering and implementation of cutting-edge music technology using React and NodeJS. This position exercised my ability to independently manage a project from scratch while learning and applying new technologies on the fly.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: This role gave me traditional experience as a software engineer. I worked on a DevOps team as a full-stack engineer to create an internal website writing in Python and Javascript. Admins have used this website throughout the company to run tests and verify vital information across the companyâ€™s many servers.

work.title: Computer Science Tutor
work.description: I tutored many students taking courses in Java, Python, assembly language, algorithms, and system software. Through tutoring others, I developed a deep and holistic understanding of computer science fundamentals myself.

projects.title: Conduction Inc.
projects.description: I led the software engineering at this music tech start up.

projects.title: Paper on AI and Music
projects.description: I wrote this paper arguing about machine learning's usage in the art of generative music.

projects.title: Generative Music Album
projects.description: After writing about machine learning and AI uses in music, I created my own generative music composing AI and used it to create this 12 track collection that I posted on my personal SoundCloud page.
